puzzle.help: 1. The board represents a garden where flowers are scattered around. 2. Your task as a gardener is to divide the garden in rectangular (or square) flower beds. 3. Each flower bed should contain exactly one flower. 4. Contiguous flower beds can't have the same area extension. 5. Green squares are hedges that can't be included in flower beds.
